feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Migrate forced releases from QA arc runners to hosted by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13843
  • Update CouchDB chart from 4.3.0 to 4.5.3. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13845
  • NGINX headers for security audit by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13842
  • Add PR size and team labeler by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13849
  • Updating pro back to correct reference (latest) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13851
  • Feature: Helm Chart support extra env vars using K8s Secrets reference by @refucktor in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13847
  • [Feat] Readonly columns by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13824
  • Quick fix for roles binding in JS by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13857
  • Enhancement: add ability to set custom auto-dismissal duration for notifications by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13829

New Contributors

  • @refucktor made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13847

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.27.6...2.28.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prepare Helm chart for SQS. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13860
  • Add readonly columns to plans by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13859

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.0...2.28.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Adding current user global ID binding by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13863
  • Adding test for globalId in self call by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13864

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.1...2.28.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix time-only form fields for internal db by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13865

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.2...2.28.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix CI build flakiness by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13867
  • Fix application deletion when SQS is enabled. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13868
  • Ignore SQS 500s on cleanup by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13872
  • Allow users to only specify a binding when adding attachments by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13819
  • Fix key value updates in patch by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13876

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.3...2.28.4
